title: Market Rebound, Coronavirus in Italy, 2020
itunes:title: Market Rebound, Coronavirus in Italy, 2020
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Panel Guests: Adrienne Elrod, Democratic Strategist, Former Director of Strategic Communications for the Hillary Clinton Presidential Campaign and Jack Kingston, Former Republican Georgia Congressman and Trump 2020 campaign surrogate.

Kevin also talked about today’s market rebound with Bloomberg markets reporter Taylor Riggs and checked in with Ross Cullen, a correspondent at Feature Story News in Rome, Italy to discuss what its like to live under nationwide Coronavirus lockdown.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
